remarks: Law for sum and difference of Hilbert space operators.  (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2004.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
hoaddsubass.1 $e |- R : ~H --> ~H $.
hoaddsubass.2 $e |- S : ~H --> ~H $.
hoaddsubass.3 $e |- T : ~H --> ~H $.
hoaddsubi $p |- ( ( R +op S ) -op T ) = ( ( R -op T ) +op S ) $.
